attributes.action: 'Politicians should stop posturing' - TELL US if that is something you know how to do.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do is in upper case letters above.  So often you say that you are unable to see what we want you to do. We hope this is helpful to you.

Every day, recently, somewhere in the newsprint industry it is reported that somebody who is an expert in whatever it is being spoken about repeatedly says 'POLITICIANS SHOULD STOP POSTURING'.  We believe that you do not understand what 'posturing' is.  Tell us if that is true or not.
